text: Used People is a 1992 romantic comedy movie. Beeban Kidron directed it based on the 1988 play The Grandma Plays by Todd Graff. It stars Shirley MacLaine, Marcello Mastroianni, Bob Dishy, Kathy Bates, Marcia Gay Harden, Jessica Tandy, Doris Roberts, Sylvia Sidney. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Japanese romance movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Beeban Kidron Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1960s
title: Used People
